functional.req: System shall analyze multiple complexity dimensions
System shall provide quantitative complexity scoring with qualitative descriptors
System shall track historical accuracy of complexity predictions
System shall recommend task decomposition based on complexity scores
System shall identify and explain complexity factors
System shall assess risks for each complexity level
System shall correlate complexity with time estimation
System shall integrate with provider selection and resource allocation

acceptance-criteria.criteria: System analyzes multiple complexity dimensions (technical difficulty, integration points, uncertainty, scope)
Complexity scoring algorithm provides quantitative assessment (0-100 scale) with qualitative descriptors
Historical accuracy tracking compares estimated vs actual complexity to improve predictions
Decomposition recommendations suggest optimal task breakdown based on complexity scores
Complexity factors identified and explained (why task is complex/simplistic)
Risk assessment identifies potential blockers and failure points for each complexity level
Time estimation correlates with complexity scores for planning and scheduling
Complexity assessment integrates with provider selection and resource allocation

test-scenarios.scenario: Complexity scores accurately predict task difficulty
Historical tracking improves prediction accuracy over time
Time estimation correlates with actual effort
